A ship's wheel or boat's wheel is a device used aboard a water vessel to change 
that vessel's course. Together with the rest of the steering mechanism, it forms 
part of the helm. It is connected to a mechanical, electric servo, or hydraulic 
system which alters the vertical angle of the vessel's rudder relative to its hull...
